casebody.data:
Third Department,

July, 1947.

(July 1, 1947.) In the Matter of the Claim of Mildred Roder, Appellant, against Northern Maytag Company et al., Respondents. Workmen’s Compensation Board, Respondent.

Motion for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals granted. The court certifies that questions of law have arisen which in its opinion ought to be reviewed by the Court of Appeals, which questions are hereby certified as follows: 1. Has the Workmen’s Compensation Board jurisdiction to make an award of death benefits against the employer and carrier? 2. Has the Workmen’s Compensation Board jurisdiction to make an award against the Special ¡Fund for Reopened Cases? All concur. [See ante, p. 838.]
